channel.title: Sebastian Ymai

item.title: COMIDILLO TAPES patch
item.description: Screen printed at home, yellow or white on black black cotton shirts. Little drawing by yours trully, help me make more tapes and look cute…
item.content:encoded:
Screen printed at home, yellow or white on black black cotton shirts. Little drawing by yours trully, help me make more tapes and look cute af.*

*You also get a free digital file of the super duper compilation PARA CUANDO EN MI TE MUERAS.

item.title: About
item.description: Sebastian Ymai Born in Santiago, Chile Spent the past 7 years in and out of the Glasgow School of Art until summer 2016 Musical endeavours…
item.content:encoded:
Sebastian Ymai

Born in Santiago, Chile Spent the past 7 years in and out of the Glasgow School of Art until summer 2016

Musical endeavours:

anxietyglasgow.bandcamp.com caroubalo.bandcamp.com pennycress.bandcamp.com rowangrows.bandcamp.com flaccidflute.bandcamp.com flaccidfathers.bandcamp.com

sebastian.y.r.varas@gmail.com

item.title: Later Works
item.description: Small show with David Roeder at the Old Hair Dressers, Glasgow. Sept 2013
item.content:encoded: Small show with David Roeder at the Old Hair Dressers, Glasgow. Sept 2013

item.title: Later Works
item.description: Assortment of water based paintings of various sizes and 4 layer cmyk screen prints, a few framed with ephemeral objects

item.title: Nightscape with Logo
